subtitleNullable: India’s First Public Benchmark Dataset for Fake News Incidents
descriptionNullable:
BharatFakeNewsKosh, India’s first public benchmark dataset of fake news incidents in India, contains 26,232 news samples that were collected from several sources, including 5 non-IFCN fact-check sites and 14 fact-check sites certified by the International Fact-Checking Network (IFCN). This dataset includes 13,721 examples of legitimate news and 12,511 cases of fraudulent news, categorized into 60 groups and characterized by 19 characteristics.
It is noteworthy because it includes incidents involving misleading information from India that were propagated on social media sites in nine different Indian languages. News articles written in Indian local languages were translated into English using Google Translator to enable annotations.
title: BharatFakeNewsKosh
